attributes.action: Record sexual and domestic violence against women as hate crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is considered a hate crime to attack someone for their race, religion, or nationality - yet not because of their gender.
2 women die every day due to domestic violence.
1 in 4 women experiences sexual assault in their lifetime.
These crimes are simply motivated by gender hatred, because they are women.
